title: Bug 21988[Editor Mgmt] MultiPageEditorPart.getActiveEditor() doesn't check for disposed
description: Bug 21988[Editor Mgmt] MultiPageEditorPart.getActiveEditor() doesn't check for disposed .To work around this, I overrode 'getActiveEditor()' to check if the containeris disposed, and return null if it is. This seems to fix the problem.
